definition: Tang Jiaxuan (1938-), politician and diplomat
Tang dynasty (618-907)/surname Tang
to exaggerate/empty/in vain/old variant of 螗[tang2]

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]
(jade)

sentences.english: State Councilor Tang Jiaxuan and other Chinese companions attended the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 國務委員唐家璇等中方陪同人員參加會見。

sentences.english: Tang also met with ROK Foreign Minister Yu Myung-hwan.
sentences.chinese: 唐家璇還會見了韓國外交通商部長官柳明桓。

sentences.english: State Councilor Tang Jiaxuan and other members of the entourage arrived by the same plane.
sentences.chinese: 國務委員唐家璇等陪同人員同機抵達。

sentences.english: State Councilor Tang Jiaxuan was present at the meetings.
sentences.chinese: 國務委員唐家璇出席了午餐會。

sentences.english: Tang first conveyed an oral message of President Hu Jintao.
sentences.chinese: 唐家璇首先轉達了胡錦濤主席的口信。

sentences.english: State Councilor Tang Jiaxuan and other accompanying personnel arrived by the same plane.
sentences.chinese: 國務委員唐家璇等陪同人員同機抵達。

sentences.english: Tang Jiaxuan pointed out that relations between China and Bosnia-Herzegovina have been developing smoothly since the establishment of diplomatic relations.
sentences.chinese: 唐家璇指出，中波兩國建交以來，雙邊關係發展平穩。

sentences.english: State Councilor Tang Jiaxuan and other Chinese companions attended the above-mentioned activities.
sentences.chinese: 國務委員唐家璇等中方陪同人員參加上述活動。

sentences.english: Tang Jiaxuan expressed his welcome to Nobutaka Machimura for his visit to China at the time when China-Japan relations are falling into a plight.
sentences.chinese: 唐家璇歡迎町村在中日關係出現困難之際訪華。

sentences.english: State Councilor Tang Jiaxuan attended the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 國務委員唐家璇參加會見。

sentences.english: Tang Jiaxuan spoke highly of the positive achievements of Karimov's visit to China.
sentences.chinese: 唐家璇高度評價卡里莫夫訪華取得的積極成果。

sentences.english: State Councilor Tang Jiaxuan attended and addressed the seminar.
sentences.chinese: 國務委員唐家璇出席會議並致辭。

sentences.english: State Councilor Tang Jiaxuan and other Chinese companions attended the talks.
sentences.chinese: 國務委員唐家璇等中方陪同人員參加會談。

sentences.english: State Councilor Tang Jiaxuan and other officials attended the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 國務委員唐家璇等參加了會見。

sentences.english: On behalf of the Chinese government, Tang Jiaxuan welcomed the heads of delegation to attend the talks in Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 唐家璇代表中國政府歡迎各位團長來北京參加會談。

sentences.english: Tang said China would also seriously study other requests of Afghanistan.
sentences.chinese: 唐家璇表示，中方還將認真研究阿方的其他要求。

definition: Li Zhaoxing (1940-), former PRC foreign minister
Li Lanqing (1932-), PRC politician
Qian Qichen (1928-2017), former Chinese vice premier
Yang Jiechi (1950-), Chinese politician and diplomat, foreign minister of PRC 2007-2013
Hu Jintao (1942-), General Secretary of the CCP 2002-2012, president of the PRC 2003-2013
Dai Bingguo (1941-), a Chinese politician and professional diplomat
Qiao Guanhua (1913-1973), PRC politician and diplomat
Jiang Zemin (1926-), politician, president of PRC 1993-2003
Wu Bangguo (1941-), PRC electrical engineer and politician, polituro member from 2002
FUKUDA Yasuo (1936-), Japanese LDP politician, prime minister 2007-2008
Hui Liangyu (1944-) PRC Hui national career politician from Guilin, background in economics, politburo member 2002-2012, deputy chair of State Council 2003-2013
Sha Zukang (1947-), Chinese diplomat
Shen Guofang (1952-), PRC assistant minister of foreign affairs (2003-2005)
Ruan Chongwu (1933-), third governor of Hainan
member of State Council (in China)
Wu Yi (1938-), one of four vice-premiers of the PRC State Council
